PackageOracle.name: DA_MODEM_INSTANCE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MODEM_INSTANCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.713088000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,mta_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,current_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,decomission_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,mta_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,current_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,decomission_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,mta_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,current_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,decomission_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_modem_instance;

body.name: DA_MODEM_INSTANCE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MODEM_INSTANCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.724609000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,mta_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,current_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,decomission_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_instance.add(fx), parms=' || mac_address || '|' || mta_mac_address || '|' || serial_num || '|' || current_status_cd || '|' || model_nm || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || decomission_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_instance a
(
a.modem_instance_id
,a.mac_address
,a.mta_mac_address
,a.serial_num
,a.current_status_cd
,a.model_nm
,a.effective_dttm
,a.decomission_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_modem_instance_id.NEXTVAL
,add.mac_address
,add.mta_mac_address
,add.serial_num
,add.current_status_cd
,add.model_nm
,add.effective_dttm
,add.decomission_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.modem_instance_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_instance.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,mta_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,current_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,decomission_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_instance.add, parms=' || mac_address || '|' || mta_mac_address || '|' || serial_num || '|' || current_status_cd || '|' || model_nm || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || decomission_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_instance a
(
a.modem_instance_id
,a.mac_address
,a.mta_mac_address
,a.serial_num
,a.current_status_cd
,a.model_nm
,a.effective_dttm
,a.decomission_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_modem_instance_id.NEXTVAL
,add.mac_address
,add.mta_mac_address
,add.serial_num
,add.current_status_cd
,add.model_nm
,add.effective_dttm
,add.decomission_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_instance.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,mta_mac_address IN VARCHAR2
,serial_num IN VARCHAR2
,current_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,model_nm IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,decomission_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_instance.add, parms=' || modem_instance_id || '|' || mac_address || '|' || mta_mac_address || '|' || serial_num || '|' || current_status_cd || '|' || model_nm || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || decomission_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_instance a
(
a.modem_instance_id
,a.mac_address
,a.mta_mac_address
,a.serial_num
,a.current_status_cd
,a.model_nm
,a.effective_dttm
,a.decomission_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.modem_instance_id
,add.mac_address
,add.mta_mac_address
,add.serial_num
,add.current_status_cd
,add.model_nm
,add.effective_dttm
,add.decomission_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_instance.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_instance.del, parms=' || modem_instance_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_modem_instance a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.modem_instance_id = del.modem_instance_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_instance.del');

END del;

END da_modem_instance;
